resources.string: 카카오톡 로그인 버튼입니다. 애플리케이션의 실행 및 IOT 기기 관리를 위해 로그인을 진행해주십시오. IoT 관리 기능을 위해 로그인 시 SmartThings 계정 로그인도 진행됩니다.
사용자분께서 선택하신 IoT 기종을 이미지로 알려주는 곳입니다.

- Geolocation API (https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Geolocation_API)
 The Geolocation API is used to retrieve the user's location, so that it can for example be used to display their position using a mapping API. This article explains the basics of how to use it. 

- ODsay API (https://lab.odsay.com/)
 This terms and conditions is effective by disclosing to members. The purpose of the terms and conditions is to prescribe basic matters such as the conditions of use, rights and obligations. The terms of use may be amended within the scope of not violating the relevant laws and regulations. The amended terms and conditions is effective by announcing users, and important regulations such as users' rights or obligations will be notified in advance. 

- SmartThings API (https://developer.smartthings.com/docs/api/public)
 The SmartThings API consists of several endpoints, including Rules, Locations, Devices, and more. Even though each of these endpoints are not standalone APIs, you may hear them referred to as such. For example, the Rules API is used to build Automations. 

- 공공 데이터 포탈 (https://www.data.go.kr/) 

- Kakao Login API (https://developers.kakao.com/)
주로 들어오는 질문이 이 곳에 추가됩니다.
